examples.translation: 新制度已对生产力造成了灾难性的影响。
examples.first: The new system has had a disastrous effect on

examples.translation: 结果之一是生产率的提高.
examples.first: One of the payoffs was an increase in

examples.translation: 提高了生产力理应增加工资.

n: the quality of being productive or having the power to produce
(economics) the ratio of the quantity and quality of units produced to the labor per unit of time
